com.foreach.across.core.context

Class AcrossContextUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.core.context.AcrossContextUtils

  • public final class AcrossContextUtils
extends Object
    Helper methods for AcrossContext configuration.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static AcrossApplicationContextHolder getAcrossApplicationContextHolder(AcrossEntity contextOrModule)
      Returns the AcrossApplicationContext attached to the module or context entity.
      static AcrossConfigurableApplicationContext getApplicationContext(AcrossEntity contextOrModule)
      Returns the Spring ApplicationContext associated with the given AcrossContext or AcrossModule.
      static Collection<ApplicationContextConfigurer> getApplicationContextConfigurers(AcrossContext context)
      Will list all ApplicationContextConfigurers to apply for the AcrossContext itself.
      static Collection<ApplicationContextConfigurer> getApplicationContextConfigurers(AcrossContext context, AcrossModule module)
      Will list all ApplicationContextConfigurers in the module, combined with the ones registered on the AcrossContext that are specified to apply to all modules.
      static AcrossListableBeanFactory getBeanFactory(AcrossEntity contextOrModule)
      Returns the Spring BeanFactory associated with the given AcrossContext or AcrossModule.
      static AcrossContextBeanRegistry getBeanRegistry(AcrossEntity acrossEntity)
      Returns the created BeanRegistry for a configured Across entity.
      static AcrossContextInfo getContextInfo(AcrossContext context)
      Returns the running AcrossContextInfo for a defined AcrossContext.
      static Collection<ApplicationContextConfigurer> getInstallerContextConfigurers(AcrossModule module)
      Will list all ApplicationContextConfigurers to be added to an installer context for the module, along with all properties that should be registered.
      static org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext getParentApplicationContext(AcrossContext context)
      Returns the Spring ApplicationContext that this AcrossContext is a child of.
      static Object getProxyTarget(Object instance)
      Unwraps the target from a proxy (or multiple proxy) hierarchy.
      static void refreshBeans(AcrossContext context)
      Will refresh all @Refreshable annotated components in the AcrossContext and perform annotated autowiring again.
      static void setAcrossApplicationContextHolder(AbstractAcrossEntity contextOrModule, AcrossApplicationContextHolder applicationContext)
      Sets the ApplicationContext wrapper on an AcrossContext or AcrossModule.

    • Method Detail

      • refreshBeans

        public static void refreshBeans(AcrossContext context)
        Will refresh all @Refreshable annotated components in the AcrossContext and perform annotated autowiring again. Additionally will scan for all @PostRefresh methods and execute those.

      • getApplicationContext

        public static AcrossConfigurableApplicationContext getApplicationContext(AcrossEntity contextOrModule)
        Returns the Spring ApplicationContext associated with the given AcrossContext or AcrossModule.
        Parameters:
        contextOrModule - AcrossApplicationHolder instance.
        Returns:
        ApplicationContext defined in the holder or null if none.

      • getParentApplicationContext

        public static org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext getParentApplicationContext(AcrossContext context)
        Returns the Spring ApplicationContext that this AcrossContext is a child of.
        Parameters:
        context - AcrossContext instance.
        Returns:
        ApplicationContext that is the parent.

      • getBeanFactory

        public static AcrossListableBeanFactory getBeanFactory(AcrossEntity contextOrModule)
        Returns the Spring BeanFactory associated with the given AcrossContext or AcrossModule.
        Parameters:
        contextOrModule - AcrossApplicationHolder instance.
        Returns:
        BeanFactory linked to the ApplicationContext in the holder or null if not yet available.

      • getContextInfo

        public static AcrossContextInfo getContextInfo(AcrossContext context)
        Returns the running AcrossContextInfo for a defined AcrossContext.
        Parameters:
        context - AcrossContext instance.
        Returns:
        AcrossContextInfo of the running context (null if none).

      • getBeanRegistry

        public static AcrossContextBeanRegistry getBeanRegistry(AcrossEntity acrossEntity)
        Returns the created BeanRegistry for a configured Across entity.
        Parameters:
        acrossEntity - AcrossContext/AcrossModule or AcrossContextInfo/AcrossModuleInfo instance
        Returns:
        AcrossContextBeanRegistry of the running context (null if none).

      • setAcrossApplicationContextHolder

        public static void setAcrossApplicationContextHolder(AbstractAcrossEntity contextOrModule,
                                                     AcrossApplicationContextHolder applicationContext)
        Sets the ApplicationContext wrapper on an AcrossContext or AcrossModule.
        Parameters:
        contextOrModule - AbstractAcrossEntity instance.
        applicationContext - AcrossApplicationContext instance.

      • getAcrossApplicationContextHolder

        public static AcrossApplicationContextHolder getAcrossApplicationContextHolder(AcrossEntity contextOrModule)
        Returns the AcrossApplicationContext attached to the module or context entity.
        Parameters:
        contextOrModule - AcrossApplicationHolder instance.
        Returns:
        Across application context information.

      • getApplicationContextConfigurers

        public static Collection<ApplicationContextConfigurer> getApplicationContextConfigurers(AcrossContext context)
        Will list all ApplicationContextConfigurers to apply for the AcrossContext itself.
        Parameters:
        context - AcrossContext instance.
        Returns:
        Merges set of ApplicationContextConfigurers.

      • getApplicationContextConfigurers

        public static Collection<ApplicationContextConfigurer> getApplicationContextConfigurers(AcrossContext context,
                                                                                        AcrossModule module)
        Will list all ApplicationContextConfigurers in the module, combined with the ones registered on the AcrossContext that are specified to apply to all modules.
        Parameters:
        context - AcrossContext instance.
        module - AcrossModule instance.
        Returns:
        Merged set of ApplicationContextConfigurers.

      • getInstallerContextConfigurers

        public static Collection<ApplicationContextConfigurer> getInstallerContextConfigurers(AcrossModule module)
        Will list all ApplicationContextConfigurers to be added to an installer context for the module, along with all properties that should be registered.
        Parameters:
        module - AcrossModule instance.
        Returns:
        Merged set of ApplicationContextConfigurers.

      • getProxyTarget

        public static Object getProxyTarget(Object instance)
        Unwraps the target from a proxy (or multiple proxy) hierarchy.
        Parameters:
        instance - Bean that can be proxied or not.
        Returns:
        Bean itself or final target of a set of proxies.
